mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS productId, category_id AS categoryId, name, description, price, stock, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM Products WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT product_id AS productId, category_id AS categoryId, name, description, price, stock, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM Products LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products (category_id, name, description, price, stock, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE Products SET category_id = #{categoryId}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId}
